Calling Bullshit on Sarah 'Fake Picture' Palin

By Krister Axel on November 22, 2012 in Random

I've got to call bullshit on this one.

Media swoon over Palin's fiery speech - my ass!

Update - read this to see how Sarah 'BS' Palin nudged the facts around - a LOT.

More like Partisan Propaganda Machine Reaches New Fury over Unlikely VP Candidate.

<!--break-->
Puh-lease. If you read that silly yahoo article, you see funny things like this:

Right-wing radio host Laura Ingraham agreed, telling Fox's Greta Van Susteren that it was the "night conservatives have been waiting for.”

Ingraham continued with high praise: "It's one of the best political speeches I have heard — ever!"

Personally, I'm much more a fan of Kucinich's speech. A statement like that is really just ignorant. A half-term governor talks about 'clean coal' and being a 'hockey mom' and the right goes into seizures. Can no-one smell the shit anymore?


Here's a real speech - you know, one that talks about real issues + stuff:




ps, that photo is a fake.
